Name: AddressType
Title: AddressType
Descriptino: The type of an address (physical / postal).

Name: AddressUse
Title: AddressUse
Descriptino: The use of an address.

Name: AdministrativeGender
Title: AdministrativeGender
Descriptino: The gender of a person used for administrative purposes.

Name: BundleType
Title: BundleType
Descriptino: Indicates the purpose of a bundle - how it is intended to be used.

Name: PracticeSettingCodeValueSet
Title: Practice Setting Code Value Set
Descriptino: This is the code representing the clinical specialty of the clinician or provider who interacted with, treated, or provided a service to/for the patient. The value set used for clinical specialty has been limited by HITSP to the value set reproduced from HITSP C80 Table 2-149 Clinical Specialty Value Set Definition.

Name: CareTeamCategory
Title: Care Team category
Descriptino: Indicates the type of care team.

Name: CareTeamStatus
Title: CareTeamStatus
Descriptino: Indicates the status of the care team.

Name: SNOMEDCTClinicalFindings
Title: SNOMED CT Clinical Findings
Descriptino: This value set includes all the "Clinical finding" [SNOMED CT](http://snomed.info/sct) codes - concepts where concept is-a 404684003 (Clinical finding (finding)).

Name: ContactPointSystem
Title: ContactPointSystem
Descriptino: Telecommunications form for contact point.

Name: ContactPointUse
Title: ContactPointUse
Descriptino: Use of contact point.

Name: ContactEntityType
Title: Contact entity type
Descriptino: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the purpose for which you would contact a contact party.

Name: DaysOfWeek
Title: DaysOfWeek
Descriptino: The days of the week.

Name: HTTPVerb
Title: HTTPVerb
Descriptino: HTTP verbs (in the HTTP command line). See [HTTP rfc](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7231) for details.

Name: Identifier Type Codes
Title: IdentifierType
Descriptino: A coded type for an identifier that can be used to determine which identifier to use for a specific purpose.

Name: IdentifierUse
Title: IdentifierUse
Descriptino: Identifies the purpose for this identifier, if known .

Name: IssueSeverity
Title: IssueSeverity
Descriptino: How the issue affects the success of the action.

Name: IssueType
Title: IssueType
Descriptino: A code that describes the type of issue.

Name: CommonLanguages
Title: Common Languages
Descriptino: This value set includes common codes from BCP-47 (http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

Name: LocationMode
Title: LocationMode
Descriptino: Indicates whether a resource instance represents a specific location or a class of locations.

Name: LocationType
Title: Location type
Descriptino: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the physical form of the Location.

Name: LocationStatus
Title: LocationStatus
Descriptino: Indicates whether the location is still in use.

Name: NameUse
Title: NameUse
Descriptino: The use of a human name.

Name: OperationOutcomeCodes
Title: Operation Outcome Codes
Descriptino: Operation Outcome codes used by FHIR test servers (see Implementation file translations.xml)

Name: OrganizationAffiliationRole
Title: Organization Affiliation Role
Descriptino: This example value set defines a set of codes that can be used to indicate the role of one Organization in relation to another.

Name: ParticipantRoles
Title: Participant Roles
Descriptino: Roles of participants that may be included in a care team.  Defined as: Is a Person, Healthcare professional (occupation) or Healthcare related organization (qualifier value).

Name: Program
Title: Program
Descriptino: This value set defines an example set of codes that could be can be used to classify groupings of service-types/specialties.

Name: ResourceType
Title: ResourceType
Descriptino: One of the resource types defined as part of this version of FHIR.

Name: SearchEntryMode
Title: SearchEntryMode
Descriptino: Why an entry is in the result set - whether it's included as a match or because of an _include requirement, or to convey information or warning information about the search process.

Name: ServiceCategory
Title: Service category
Descriptino: This value set defines an example set of codes that can be used to classify groupings of service-types/specialties.

Name: ServiceProvisionConditions
Title: ServiceProvisionConditions
Descriptino: The code(s) that detail the conditions under which the healthcare service is available/offered.

Name: ReferralMethod
Title: ReferralMethod
Descriptino: The methods of referral can be used when referring to a specific HealthCareService resource.

Name: ServiceType
Title: Service type
Descriptino: This value set defines an example set of codes of service-types.

Name: Hl7VSBedStatus
Title: hl7VS-bedStatus
Descriptino: Value Set of codes that specify the state of a bed in an inpatient setting, and is used to determine if a patient may be assigned to it or not.

Name: v3.ConfidentialityClassification
Title: V3 Value SetConfidentialityClassification
Descriptino: Set of codes used to value Act.Confidentiality and Role.Confidentiality attribute in accordance with the definition for concept domain "Confidentiality".

Name: ServiceDeliveryLocationRoleType
Title: ServiceDeliveryLocationRoleType
Descriptino: A role of a place that further classifies the setting (e.g., accident site, road side, work site, community location) in which services are delivered.

Name: AddressValidationStatusVS
Title: BC Address Validation Status Value Set
Descriptino: BC address validation status value set.

Name: CommunicationPurposeVS
Title: BC Communication Purpose Value Set
Descriptino: BC communication purpose value set.

Name: EndReasonVS

Name: ExpertiseVS
Title: BC Expertise Value Set
Descriptino: BC Expertise value set.

Name: HealthDeliverySiteTypeVS
Title: BC Health Delivery Site Type Value Set
Descriptino: BC ealth Delivery Site Type Value set.

Name: LanguageVS
Title: BC Language Value Set
Descriptino: BC Language value set.

Name: LicenseStatusClassVS

Name: LicenseReasonVS

Name: LicenseStatusVS
